experience_error: Failed to setup experience, there was an error with settings.json or Github API wont respond back, try again later.
experienceStrings_error: Experience strings not found for experience with ID:
install_error: Unzip error, release extension must be .zip and the experience can't be running.

versionDownloadNeeded: Download needed, press download button to start downloading.

versionUpdateMainNeeded: Update needed, press download to get the latest package
input_error_nomapping: Experience has no input_mapping file, this should be added before releasing the experience
input_error_device: Couldn't connect to device, try again.
addons_error_noaddons: Experience has no addons file, this should be added before releasing the experience
